translation.en: [man] I was a pretty cocky and arrogant kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候自负又自傲

translation.en: I would tell anyone that would listen
translation.zh: 我会对任何愿意听的人说

translation.en: that I was gonna be the best golfer in the world.
translation.zh: 我会成为世界上最好的高尔夫球手

translation.en: -[man 2] Growing up, watching Tiger Woods. -[man 3] Tiger!
translation.zh: -从小看着泰格伍兹 -泰格

translation.en: [man 2] This guy's the same skin color as I am.
translation.zh: 这家伙和我的肤色一样

translation.en: [reporter] Do you think you can win the Masters this week?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能赢得大师赛吗？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以

translation.en: [man 4] The PGA TOUR is the pinnacle of men's professional golf.
translation.zh: 美巡赛是男子职业高尔夫的顶峰

translation.en: [woman] There's just a whole different level of competition.
translation.zh: 竞争水平完全不同

translation.en: [man 5] There are over 50 tournaments a year, with over 100 golfers at each event.
translation.zh: 每年有超过50场锦标赛 每场比赛有超过100位球手

translation.en: [woman] Any player will tell you.
translation.zh: 任何球手都会告诉你

translation.en: You cannot emulate the feeling of a major championship.
translation.zh: 大赛的感觉无可比拟

translation.en: [man 6] If you don't win a major, you can't be considered one of the all-time greats.
translation.zh: 如果你没有赢过大赛 就不会被当成最出色的高尔夫球手

translation.en: There's nothing like the life of a golfer.
translation.zh: 没什么比高尔夫球手的生活更棒了

translation.en: It's a traveling circus.
translation.zh: 就像个旅游团

translation.en: [announcer] This is starting to get interesting.
translation.zh: 事情变得有趣起来了

translation.en: If you're gonna be a pro golfer, you have to accept that it'll be a wild ride.
translation.zh: 如果你想成为职业高尔夫球手 你必须接受这是趟疯狂的旅程

translation.en: Fuck are you doing!? Jesus.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？ 天啊

translation.en: -Joey! Tell Joey to move his fucking cart. -[man 7 laughs]
translation.zh: 乔伊！叫乔伊把他的车移开

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: [man 8] One word to describe golf this year…
translation.zh: 用一个词来形容今年的高尔夫

translation.en: Disruption.
translation.zh: 极具破坏力

translation.en: There is a power struggle going on in golf.
translation.zh: 高尔夫界出现了权力斗争

translation.en: [reporter 2] Officials in Saudi Arabia are trying to create a new golf league
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯的官员们 正努力打造一个全新联赛

translation.en: to rival the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh: 来与美巡赛抗衡

translation.en: [man 6] LIV has offers out to some of the biggest names in the sport.
translation.zh: 丽芙邀请了运动界一些大人物

translation.en: Everything's got a price, I guess.
translation.zh: 所有东西都有价码

translation.en: It's not really like anything that we've seen in sports before.
translation.zh: 这跟我们以前 在运动中见过的任何事都不同

translation.en: [woman 2] It's rattled the golf ecosystem, hasn't it?
translation.zh: 它扰乱了高尔夫的生态系统 对吧？

translation.en: Honestly, it's going to shape the future of professional golf.
translation.zh: 老实说这会影响职业高尔夫的未来

translation.en: [man 6] The golf world is teeming with storylines right now.
translation.zh: 高尔夫界现在充满了矛盾冲突

translation.en: [man 10] The game has never been more controversial than it is this year.
translation.zh: 比赛从没像今年一样具有争议性

translation.en: [man 8] I mean, they're pulling you in so many different directions.
translation.zh: 人们从不同方向拉扯着自己

translation.en: What's noise, and what's not noise?
translation.zh: 什么重要 什么不重要？

translation.en: You can't, almost, believe what's happening in the game.
translation.zh: 你不能总是相信比赛中发生的事

translation.en: I did not envision any of this happening.
translation.zh: 我没想到会发生这种事

translation.en: It's a totally different situation now, and anything can happen.
translation.zh: 现在情况完全不同 一切皆有可能

translation.en: You have picked a hell of a year to start following the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh: 你们选择了波涛汹涌的一年 来记录美巡赛啊

translation.en: [man] Hey, Jill.
translation.zh: 吉尔

translation.en: We just left the golf course, and we're gonna go to the airport,
translation.zh: 我们刚离开高尔夫球场 正要去机场

translation.en: and then we're gonna fly back home.
translation.zh: 然后坐飞机回家

translation.en: Yeah, we'll see you in a little bit.
translation.zh: 嗯 晚点见

translation.en: -Can you guess the card for 1,000, Justin? -I'd love to.
translation.zh: -你能猜中牌吗 赌1000 贾斯汀？ -来吧

translation.en: -Take a guess. -Seven of hearts.
translation.zh: -猜猜看 -红桃七

translation.en: Ace of clubs.
translation.zh: 梅花A

translation.en: All right, one more guess.
translation.zh: 好 再猜一次

translation.en: [Thomas] I know exactly what it is.
translation.zh: 我知道是什么了

translation.en: I want the top card. It's an eight of hearts.
translation.zh: 我要最上面那张牌 红桃八

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [Spieth] Yeah, maybe next time.
translation.zh: 好 下次吧

translation.en: [announcer] Everybody's talking about the two amazingly talented freshmen,
translation.zh: 大家都在谈论 这两位横空出世的优秀新手

translation.en: Justin Thomas and Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀托马斯和乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [Thomas] I've played golf against Jordan since we were 13.
translation.zh: 我从13岁开始就和乔丹打高尔夫

translation.en: [announcer] Justin Thomas. Missed cue left.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀托马斯 左路打飞了

translation.en: We've grown up playing against each other, and we've just kept battling it out.
translation.zh: 我们从小就一起比赛 一直是对手

translation.en: [announcer] And Jordan Spieth in firm control.
translation.zh: 乔丹斯皮斯完全掌控了比赛

translation.en: [Thomas] I was very jealous of everything that Jordan did.
translation.zh: 我很羡慕乔丹做的一切

translation.en: [Spieth] And how's second place feel for next week?
translation.zh: 下周当第二名怎么样？

translation.en: Pretty good?
translation.zh: 挺好的

translation.en: [Thomas] I mean, you could go as far to say angry, because it's like it wasn't me.
translation.zh: 甚至可以说是愤怒 但我不是

translation.en: [announcer] One of the epic performances.
translation.zh: 一场史诗般的比赛

translation.en: [announcer 2] The United States Open champion, Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: 美国公开赛冠军乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [announcer 3] And the champion golfer of the year, Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: 以及年度最佳高尔夫球手 乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: [man] Jordan turned pro before JT did.
translation.zh: 乔丹比贾斯汀先成为职业选手

translation.en: Jordan was 21 years old and was number one in the world,
translation.zh: 乔丹21岁时就世界排名第一

translation.en: and JT's reputation at that time was kind of Jordan's friend.
translation.zh: 当时贾斯汀就只被看作是乔丹的朋友

translation.en: [Thomas] He's one of my best friends. We're always gonna pull for each other,
translation.zh: 他是我最好的朋友之一 我们总会对彼此加油

translation.en: but at the same time, you know, I hope that I beat him at every single tournament that we play in
translation.zh: 但与此同时 我也希望接下去的所有锦标赛

translation.en: for the rest of our life.
translation.zh: 我都能打败他

translation.en: -[Thomas] What's up? -[man] How are you?
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -你好吗？

translation.en: [Thomas] Good. How are you?
translation.zh: 很好 你好吗？

translation.en: You're good. I got it.
translation.zh: 没事 我来吧

translation.en: Gotta make it seem like I can do something for myself every once in a while.
translation.zh: 总得让我感觉偶尔自己还有点用

translation.en: Just sometimes.
translation.zh: 只是偶尔

translation.en: [man] We're not sure what direction he's gonna hit this yet.
translation.zh: 不确定他会往哪个方向打

translation.en: -[kid laughs] -[Thomas] I did always wanna be a golfer.
translation.zh: 我一直想当高尔夫球手

translation.en: What you got there? Oh!
translation.zh: 你那里有什么？

translation.en: [Thomas] I was probably a year and a half or so when I started screwing around with plastic clubs.
translation.zh: 我大概一岁半就开始玩塑料球杆

translation.en: [man] Oh! Good shot!
translation.zh: 好球！

translation.en: [Thomas] My dad…
translation.zh: 我爸…

translation.en: [man] Oh, you gonna stretch a bit.
translation.zh: 你要挤进去

translation.en: [Thomas] He's been a club pro for a long time.
translation.zh: 他做了很长时间的职业选手

translation.en: My grandpa was a PGA pro for 50-plus years.
translation.zh: 我爷爷当了50多年美巡赛职业球手

translation.en: If I look at the order, I should be able to find it. Yes, still here.
translation.zh: 如果看顺序 应该能找到 还在这里

translation.en: Looks like we started in '99, so he'd have been six years old.
translation.zh: 看来是从99年开始记录的 那时候他应该六岁了

translation.en: Kind of cool. Looks like we stopped in 2021.
translation.zh: 有点酷 2021年是最后一次

translation.en: Guess he reached the end there.
translation.zh: 应该是不再长了

translation.en: If I was going to play a sport, it wasn't gonna be anything other than golf.
translation.zh: 如果要我选择一项运动 肯定是高尔夫

translation.en: [man] One…
translation.zh: 一…

translation.en: [woman] Two… [child] Three!
translation.zh: 二 三！

translation.en: [man] Oh my goodness!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Thomas] It just so happened this was, fortunately for me, the only thing I was good at.
translation.zh: 恰好也幸好 这是我唯一擅长的事

translation.en: Thank goodness.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: [Thomas] So I pursued a career in it.
translation.zh: 所以我走上了职业高尔夫的道路

translation.en: [announcer] And Thomas with the finishing touches.
translation.zh: 托马斯的最后一杆

translation.en: Third generation PGA professional.
translation.zh: 第三代美巡赛职业高尔夫球员

translation.en: [Thomas] Winning my first major was awesome.
translation.zh: 赢得我的第一个大赛冠军真是太棒了

translation.en: But, um, haven't won another since then.
translation.zh: 但从那之后我就再也没有赢过

translation.en: I'm eager. I'm ready. I know that I'm playing well enough to win.
translation.zh: 我很渴望 我准备好了 我知道凭我的实力可以获胜

translation.en: To be perfectly honest, just kind of pissed off I haven't gotten it done yet.
translation.zh: 老实说 我有点生气自己还没赢

translation.en: [man] How is your relationship with Jordan nowadays? Are you guys still tight?
translation.zh: 你现在和乔丹的关系怎么样？ 还那么铁吗？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, he's the best man at my wedding. So I hope he'd say the same.
translation.zh: 对 他是我婚礼的伴郎 所以我希望他也会这么说

translation.en: Speaking of-- Jordan's calling me right now. What the hell does he want?
translation.zh: 真巧 乔丹给我打电话了 他到底想干什么？

translation.en: -Hey, man. What's up? -[Thomas] Hi, Jordan.
translation.zh: -嘿 老兄 怎么了？ -乔丹

translation.en: Do you think for my speech for your wedding,
translation.zh: 你觉得我在你婚礼上的致辞

translation.en: that I've already completed and memorized, obviously, and have an acting skit for,
translation.zh: 我已经写完并记住了 还准备了表演

translation.en: do you think there's anything I should avoid, or add in, or…
translation.zh: 你觉得有什么我该避免或添加的吗？

translation.en: [Thomas] Pretty much whatever your instincts tell you, avoid that.
translation.zh: 只要是你直觉想做的 都给我避免

translation.en: -Okay. All right. So stick to the script. -All right, see you.
translation.zh: -好的 严格按照写好的词 -好了 再见

translation.en: Okay, buh-bye.
translation.zh: 好 拜拜

translation.en: Sick.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: JT and Jordan are two of my closer buddies out on tour.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀和乔丹是锦标赛里 我最好的朋友

translation.en: Yeah, I'd do just about anything for them.
translation.zh: 我愿意为他们做任何事

translation.en: -Here we are, for scorecard update. -Justin Thomas up one hundred.
translation.zh: -来了 记分卡更新 -贾斯汀托马斯上升至100分

translation.en: Jordan Spieth down 60. Rickie Fowler down 60.
translation.zh: 乔丹斯皮斯60分 瑞奇福勒60分

translation.en: [Fowler] We're, in a way, kind of all out there and in it together.
translation.zh: 从某种意义上来说 我们是一条船上的人

translation.en: You do get a sense of satisfaction when you do see a friend succeed and play well.
translation.zh: 看到朋友成功并打好球时会有满足感

translation.en: But there's also kind of an underlying kind of kick in the butt, like…
translation.zh: 但其实也有不好受的感觉

translation.en: I don't want to see him beat me. I wanna go beat him.
translation.zh: 我不希望他打败我 我想赢他

translation.en: [Fowler] One, two, three, birdies!
translation.zh: 一 二 三 小鸟球！

translation.en: When's the first time you met? Was it a golf tournament?
translation.zh: 你第一次见面是什么时候？ 是高尔夫锦标赛吗？

translation.en: Yeah. It was here in Texas.
translation.zh: 对 是在德州

translation.en: Our 2011 high school class was really strong.
translation.zh: 我们2011界高中很强

translation.en: I mean, there's probably a dozen guys that still have tour cards 10 years later.
translation.zh: 十年后大概还有十来个人有锦标赛卡

translation.en: So it was really competitive, and we were one and two in the country.
translation.zh: 所以竞争非常激烈 当时我们在全国排名第一和第二

translation.en: You know, when you watch both of them, their passion is to be the best,
translation.zh: 当你看着他俩时 他们的目标是做最第一名

translation.en: and Jordan just came out with that flash.
translation.zh: 乔丹以漂亮的成绩横空出世

translation.en: That's never gonna happen again.
translation.zh: 这种事不会再发生了

translation.en: It's not like Jordan's dropped off.
translation.zh: 而且乔丹并没有退步

translation.en: Winning that many majors early on, I mean, that's hard to continue to do that.
translation.zh: 这么年轻就多次赢得大赛 很难保持这种势头

translation.en: And then you have Justin Thomas, who's been getting better and better and better.
translation.zh: 然后贾斯汀托马斯也越来越强

translation.en: And you could say that Justin has closed the gap on Jordan.
translation.zh: 可以说贾斯汀缩小了和乔丹的差距

translation.en: But Jordan still has the potential to be great.
translation.zh: 但乔丹依然有潜力成为伟大的球手

translation.en: [Greller] That looked great.
translation.zh: 看起来很棒

translation.en: [announcer] It is a gorgeous day.
translation.zh: 今天天气很棒

translation.en: The Harbor Town Golf Links.
translation.zh: 海港镇高尔夫球场

translation.en: The PGA TOUR so proud to present to you the RBC Heritage.
translation.zh: 美巡赛很荣幸为你呈现RBC传承赛

translation.en: [boy] You're my favorite golfer!
translation.zh: 你是我最喜欢的球手

translation.en: RBC Heritage, because of how early on in the year it is,
translation.zh: RBC传承赛在年初举行

translation.en: it can end up being a trampoline to the rest of the year.
translation.zh: 这个比赛会成为一整年的风向标

translation.en: [Renner] Every player plays with this confidence that you have to have,
translation.zh: 每个球手都要带着 无与伦比的自信打球

translation.en: that when they're playing their best, no one can beat them.
translation.zh: 使出全力 无人能敌

translation.en: [Morikawa] You want to play well and win.
translation.zh: 你想打得好 你想赢

translation.en: What I look for is just can we perform week in and week out?
translation.zh: 我思考的是 我们是否能每周都保持高水准？

translation.en: [Johnson] Every facet of your game has to be firing on all cylinders
translation.zh: 如果你想在周日举起奖杯

translation.en: if you want a chance to hold that trophy on Sunday.
translation.zh: 那所有方面都必须做到最好

translation.en: Yeah, I'm down. I'm around all week, dude. Let's tee it up.
translation.zh: 我来了 我整周都要在这里 我们来准备吧

translation.en: [Fitzpatrick] Success this season will be winning on the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh: 想要在本赛季取得成功 那就意味着要在美巡赛上获胜

translation.en: I want to get to world number one, just to prove to myself that I can do it.
translation.zh: 我想成为世界第一 证明自己能做到

translation.en: As a rookie, you definitely want to be known as the top dog in your class.
translation.zh: 身为新人 你肯定想跻身前列

translation.en: And my goal is to win Rookie of the Year.
translation.zh: 我的目标是赢得年度最佳新人

translation.en: Golf on the PGA TOUR is difficult, tiring. It's stressful.
translation.zh: 美巡赛的高尔夫赛很难 疲惫 压力大

translation.en: But we just know there's gonna be ups and downs. This game's a roller coaster ride.
translation.zh: 但我们都知道比赛有起有落 这个比赛就像坐过山车

translation.en: [Thomas] I just feel like if I just go for a weak left hand
translation.zh: 我觉得我只要左侧打轻一点

translation.en: and try not to dig, it's never really gonna get in trouble.
translation.zh: 不要集中地面 应该就没事

translation.en: [Thomas] If you're competitive and a good player,
translation.zh: 如果你好胜 还是个好球手

translation.en: all it takes is one week and your life changes.
translation.zh: 只需要一周就能改变人生

translation.en: [announcer] Next on the tee, from Louisville, Kentucky, Justin Thomas.
translation.zh: 下一个发球的是来自肯塔基州 路易斯维尔的贾斯汀托马斯

translation.en: [Renner] So a regular PGA TOUR event, it's four rounds. It starts on Thursday.
translation.zh: 在美巡赛中 常规比赛是四轮 星期四开始

translation.en: There's a full field around, let's call it, 150 players.
translation.zh: 首先是所有球手参赛 大概150名

translation.en: They play Thursday and Friday.
translation.zh: 他们在周四和周五比赛

translation.en: [announcer 2] This little one for the par.
translation.zh: 这一杆是平标准杆

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, baby! -[applause] [man 2] Let's go! [man 3] Whoo! Whoo!
translation.zh: （标准杆 每个洞标准入洞杆数）

translation.en: [Renner] Unlike other sports, you're trying to record the lowest score possible.
translation.zh: 跟其他运动不同 高尔夫比的是谁分数低

translation.en: From there, if you're not in that top 65 and ties, you have missed the cut.
translation.zh: 之后如果没有进入前65名 那就直接被淘汰

translation.en: -[crowd] Oh! -[announcer 3] That hurts a bit.
translation.zh: 太可惜了

translation.en: [Renner] You are not getting paid, and you're going home.
translation.zh: 拿不到钱 直接回家

translation.en: [Renner] This pressure just gets higher and higher as the days go on,
translation.zh: 随着时间流逝 压力也越来越大

translation.en: and then Sunday afternoon, we crown our champion.
translation.zh: 到了周日下午 就会诞生冠军

translation.en: [announcer] Thanks for joining us for the final round from Hilton Head.
translation.zh: 感谢各位参加希尔顿黑德岛的决赛

translation.en: [announcer] Got a chance…
translation.zh: 有机会

translation.en: [announcer] How about that. Jordan Spieth from the bunker.
translation.zh: 太厉害了 乔丹斯皮斯的沙坑球

translation.en: That's an eagle for him at the second hole.
translation.zh: 他在第二洞打出了老鹰球

translation.en: He knows he's in this thing.
translation.zh: 他很清楚自己在比赛

translation.en: [announcer 2] He hasn't won since last April,
translation.zh: 他从去年四月就没赢过

translation.en: but he's looking to change that here today.
translation.zh: 但他今天想在这里改变

translation.en: [announcer 3] JT. Really struggled with the putter this year.
translation.zh: JT今年在推杆方面很不顺

translation.en: [announcer] Well, that is a sloppy bogey for Justin Thomas.
translation.zh: 对贾斯汀托马斯来说 是个不太好的柏忌球

translation.en: [announcer 4] And he'll just be more annoyed than anything right there.
translation.zh: 他会比任何人都生气

translation.en: The biggest thing for me, in terms of weakness in my game, is just capitalizing
translation.zh: 我在比赛中最大的弱点 对我来说最重要的就是变现

translation.en: and trying to get some momentum,
translation.zh: 让自己的势头起来

translation.en: you know, trying to get myself back in position and playing with that confidence.
translation.zh: 回到好的状态 带着自信打比赛

translation.en: [man] Let's go, Jordan. Win this thing!
translation.zh: 加油 乔丹 赢得比赛！

translation.en: [announcer] This, for a third eagle.
translation.zh: 这是第三个老鹰球 是自昨天起的九球的延续

translation.en: Home.
translation.zh: 是自昨天起的九球的延续

translation.en: [announcer 3] Just a struggle with fairways today, for sure.
translation.zh: 今天在球道上有点不顺

translation.en: [Spieth] I'm just trying to stay patient.
translation.zh: 我只是想保持耐心

translation.en: [announcer] Ah, he clipped a tree there.
translation.zh: 球蹭到树了

translation.en: [Spieth] It can be deflating sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候会让人泄气

translation.en: [announcer 5] Hasn't won since THE PLAYERS Championship 2021.
translation.zh: 他在2021年 获得球员锦标赛冠军后还没赢过

translation.en: Been close, but he's still looking.
translation.zh: 距离很近 但他还在找角度

translation.en: [announcer] Spieth has 12 career wins, and two of 'em ended
translation.zh: 斯皮斯获得过12场职业球赛的胜利 其中两场的最后一球

translation.en: with a bunker shot at the final green.
translation.zh: 是从沙坑一杆打到果岭

translation.en: Could he do it again?
translation.zh: 他能再次做到吗？

translation.en: Oh, seriously!
translation.zh: 难以置信

translation.en: -What a shot! -[announcer 3] Yeah.
translation.zh: -太棒了 -对

translation.en: [announcer] Jordan Spieth breaks the winless drought.
translation.zh: 乔丹斯皮斯终于旗开得胜

translation.en: Good for him. What a win.
translation.zh: 真是…太棒了

translation.en: [Spieth] Winning out here feels great.
translation.zh: 在这里获胜感觉很好

translation.en: But for me, it was more of a relief.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 这更像是松了一口气

translation.en: [man] Way to go, Jordan!
translation.zh: 好样的 乔丹！

translation.en: [Spieth] Once that happened, I've got some momentum.
translation.zh: 我获胜后 就会有乘胜追击的势头

translation.en: [girl] Jordan!
translation.zh: 乔丹！

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Jordan Spieth!
translation.zh: 乔丹斯皮斯！

translation.en: [Spieth] I mean, it's so easy to say you just gotta get over it, but it's always easier said than done.
translation.zh: 说克服低潮期很简单 但说起来容易做起来难

translation.en: [Spieth] I don't like the detach feeling.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这种分开的感觉

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I don't like that either.
translation.zh: 不 我也不喜欢

translation.en: It's like… That's why I try to hit some slow.
translation.zh: 所以我试着慢慢打

translation.en: -So I can go like… -Yeah. I'll get a picture.
translation.zh: -这样就可以 -嗯 我明白

translation.en: [Mike] I guess I could say I've been Justin's coach since day one.
translation.zh: 我想从一开始我就是贾斯汀的教练

translation.en: -Feels like I'm, like, back here. -[Mike] Yeah, let's just try one more.
translation.zh: -感觉我在这里 -对 再试一次

translation.en: I mean, that's a difficult thing, being a parent and a coach at the same time.
translation.zh: 平衡做父母和做教练很不容易

translation.en: Look at the line on your shaft.
translation.zh: 看看你的轴心上的线

translation.en: -I wanna see, like, my hands, like-- -Like how far out they go?
translation.zh: -我想看看我的手 -看有多远吗？

translation.en: [Thomas] Fucking hate that, man.
translation.zh: 我讨厌那样

translation.en: [Mike] I mean, any time that he is in any state of discouragement
translation.zh: 每当他陷入消极状态

translation.en: or something about any performance that he recently had,
translation.zh: 或是沉溺于最近的挫折

translation.en: it ultimately always comes back to, let's not forget you're pretty good too.
translation.zh: 其实关键是不要忘记自己也很厉害

translation.en: Everybody's going to have times where they don't perform
translation.zh: 每个人都会有发挥

translation.en: at the level they want to perform.
translation.zh: 不如意的时候

translation.en: Do you remember the shoot we did out at, um…
translation.zh: 你记得我们拍摄的那场…

translation.en: [sighs] I want to say it was for Coca-Cola, in that old house out in Dallas.
translation.zh: 给可口可乐拍的那次 在达拉斯的旧房子里面

translation.en: Yeah, and there was one they were going to do something similar the year before,
translation.zh: 对 还有一年前他们也想做个类似的

translation.en: and then the weather was bad, it turned into the one when I was hitting shots on the…
translation.zh: 结果天气太糟糕 最后变成我打球了

translation.en: [Moses] That ended up being the best commercial. -Like, all the trick shots in the trailer. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 但那个广告最好 所有的技巧都展示出来了

translation.en: -[Moses] All right. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好的 -谢谢

translation.en: [Dethier] Obviously, the goal at every PGA TOUR event is to win,
translation.zh: 显然每场美巡赛的目标都是获胜

translation.en: but when guys actually do,
translation.zh: 但当真的取得冠军后

translation.en: they don't just get the trophy and the first-place check.
translation.zh: 他们不只是拿到奖杯和第一名奖金

translation.en: -[man] So this is your fake home, huh? -Hmm?
translation.zh: 所以这是你的假家吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[man] This is your fake home?
translation.zh: -对 -这是你的假家

translation.en: It's really nice.
translation.zh: 很棒

translation.en: [Dethier] They get fame and notoriety and sponsor deals.
translation.zh: 他们得到名气 名声和赞助

translation.en: You went there to win a golf tournament, and you end up turning into a celebrity.
translation.zh: 本来是去赢高尔夫锦标赛 结果成了名人

translation.en: [man 2] So what we want to do is just be authentic to golf and be authentic to you
translation.zh: 我们想真实地展现高尔夫 真实地展现你

translation.en: so that it comes off the right way.
translation.zh: 正确地表达出来

translation.en: -That cool? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -可以吗？ -好的

translation.en: [Foley] The trick is to know that the reason that these companies want to be a part of you
translation.zh: 关键是要知道这些公司 之所以想跟你合作

translation.en: is because you perform and you succeed.
translation.zh: 是因为你表现出色 获得成功

translation.en: But subconsciously, there's more pressure to perform,
translation.zh: 但潜意识里 你也会对下次比赛更有压力

translation.en: because, you know, you want to do well for the people supporting you.
translation.zh: 因为你想为支持你的人好好发挥

translation.en: Yeah, I'm not an actor,
translation.zh: 我不是演员

translation.en: so you guys tell me if I'm saying it wrong and say it different. I will not take offense.
translation.zh: 所以如果我说错了 告诉我该怎么做 我不会觉得被冒犯

translation.en: -[woman] You are good. -[woman 2] Quiet in the house.
translation.zh: -你很厉害 -片场安静

translation.en: You see, you need to rotate your hips.
translation.zh: 你需要旋转臀部

translation.en: Mopping can help with that. Start in the hallway.
translation.zh: 拖地可以帮忙 从走廊开始吧

translation.en: [woman 2] And cut. Jordan, you're a natural.
translation.zh: 停 乔丹 你真是无师自通

translation.en: -Just gotta teach me like that, you know? -[woman 2] Yeah, you're great. Honestly.
translation.zh: -你得这样教我 知道吗？ -你很棒 乔丹 真的

translation.en: Hello. Good morning. I wanna put these away. How are you?
translation.zh: 早上好 我想把这些收起来 你好吗？

translation.en: -Keys are in the car. -[woman] Okay, thank you. Have fun!
translation.zh: -钥匙在车里 -好 谢谢 玩得开心！

translation.en: -All right. See you. -[woman] Thank you, guys. Bye!
translation.zh: -好 再见 -谢谢你们 再见

translation.en: [Rapaport] There are four tournaments in golf that stand on their own. They're above everything.
translation.zh: 高尔夫球界有四大赛事 规格比其他比赛都要高

translation.en: You have the Masters. You have the PGA Championship.
translation.zh: 大师赛 美巡冠军赛

translation.en: You have the U.S. Open and The Open Championship.
translation.zh: 美国公开赛和公开赛

translation.en: And winning one of those four, that's how the great players are measured.
translation.zh: 赢得这四个中的任意一个 才能算得上是厉害的球手

translation.en: [Thomas] The PGA Championship this year is at Southern Hills.
translation.zh: 今年的美巡冠军赛在南山举行

translation.en: Come on. Type it in, Jordan. Look up the directions to Southern Hills…
translation.zh: 快点打字 乔丹 在飞机起飞之前查一查

translation.en: before we get in the air.
translation.zh: 去南山的方向

translation.en: I know absolutely nothing about it, so that's why I'm doing this today.
translation.zh: 我对那场地一无所知 所以今天才来打球

translation.en: Last time I played it, I was 16, so…
translation.zh: 上次我在那里打球时才16岁

translation.en: And I think they changed the golf course. That's why we're here.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们改变了高尔夫球场 所以我们才来这里

translation.en: Added about 500 yards and got rid of, like, 600 trees.
translation.zh: 加上了460米距离 去掉了600棵树

translation.en: The quick trip of a 40-minute flight there and back
translation.zh: 在大赛前坐40分钟飞机来回练习

translation.en: to go play practice rounds before majors, it just totally made sense.
translation.zh: 在大赛前坐40分钟飞机来回练习 非常合理

translation.en: [Thomas] How you doing? Justin Thomas and Jordan Spieth.
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 贾斯汀托马斯和乔丹斯皮斯

translation.en: We're gonna try to play some golf today.
translation.zh: 我们今天要去打高尔夫

translation.en: -[Spieth] You ready, Justin? -Sure.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗 贾斯汀？ -当然

translation.en: Uh, what do you do wanna do?
translation.zh: 你想怎么玩？

translation.en: [Thomas] Do a hammer game?
translation.zh: 锤子比赛吗？

translation.en: -Fifty hammer, birdie double? -Yeah. Something like that.
translation.zh: -50锤赌注 小鸟球翻倍 -对 差不多这样

translation.en: Let's just do that. Fifty hammer, birdie double.
translation.zh: 就这样 50锤赌注 小鸟球翻倍

translation.en: [Thomas] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: It's literally 60 yards farther than I thought it was going to come down.
translation.zh: 比我预想的还要远55米

translation.en: Yeah, it's in the middle of the fairway. [blows raspberry]
translation.zh: 球道中间

translation.en: [Thomas] Practice rounds, money games,
translation.zh: 练手 赌钱

translation.en: it's kind of good prep for a tournament, you know?
translation.zh: 是锦标赛前的好练习

translation.en: Grab a wedge from you.
translation.zh: 能让人进入状态

translation.en: -A solid smash. -Oh my God. You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: -稳如泰山 -天呐 你在开玩笑吧

translation.en: That was so good.
translation.zh: 太酷了

translation.en: [Thomas] But losing isn't as bad as having to give that person your money.
translation.zh: 输掉其实还好 最糟的是要给钱

translation.en: [Spieth] Oh, it landed on the green!
translation.zh: 球落在果岭上了

translation.en: [Spieth] We play a lot of practice rounds together,
translation.zh: 我们一起打过很多练习赛

translation.en: and it's a lot more fun when people have to watch him hand me money.
translation.zh: 有人看着他给我钱时会更有趣

translation.en: Hammer!
translation.zh: 锤子！

translation.en: -Shit! -Thanks.
translation.zh: -该死！ -谢谢

translation.en: God, what a terrible minute that was.
translation.zh: 天呐 真是太糟糕了

translation.en: [Spieth] You'll never get mad at free money.
translation.zh: 免费拿钱总不会让人生气

translation.en: [Thomas] It's just like watching them walk away with your cash,
translation.zh: 看着他们拿着你的钱

translation.en: and they have that bragging rights on you until the next time you play again. Sucks.
translation.zh: 还对此夸夸其谈 直到下次打球 太糟糕了

translation.en: -Come on, Justin. -Oh no.
translation.zh: -拜托 贾斯汀 -不

translation.en: -You go in the water? -[Thomas] It went in!
translation.zh: 掉进水里了吗？进去了

translation.en: [Spieth] We both want to push each other.
translation.zh: 我们都想激励对方

translation.en: -It's inspiring. -Wow. Hello.
translation.zh: -很鼓舞人心 -不错噢

translation.en: A little bit of kind of fire.
translation.zh: 刺激对方

translation.en: -Damn it! -Shut up.
translation.zh: 可恶 闭嘴

translation.en: Fuck you, Justin.
translation.zh: 去你的 贾斯汀

translation.en: I wanna end up having more wins than he does.
translation.zh: 我想最后比他赢更多

translation.en: -[Spieth] Wow! Meow! -[Thomas] This is so--
translation.zh: -哇！ -真是…

translation.en: [Mike] I mean, they're big practical jokers.
translation.zh: 他们都喜欢开玩笑

translation.en: Justin, the first year he played in Phoenix,
translation.zh: 贾斯汀 他在凤凰城比赛的第一年

translation.en: Jordan paid the valet to move his cart off-site.
translation.zh: 乔丹付钱给代客泊车的人 把他的高尔夫球车开走

translation.en: [Spieth] Throw? A hundred dollars? Am I going first?
translation.zh: 扔球吗？100美元？我先吗？

translation.en: [Mike] So he came out to get in his car. It wasn't there.
translation.zh: 所以他出来找车的时候 车没了

translation.en: [Spieth] This has got potential.
translation.zh: 这个球有潜力

translation.en: Of course, he knew immediately who it was.
translation.zh: 当然 他马上就知道是谁干的

translation.en: Jordan's like, "I dunno anything about that."
translation.zh: 乔丹说：“我什么都不知道”

translation.en: He was literally there for two hours before he told him and the valet got it.
translation.zh: 他在那待了两个小时 然后对方才告诉他 才把车开过来

translation.en: Hey, man. How do you think your year's going, Justin?
translation.zh: 伙计 你觉得今年你怎么样 贾斯汀？

translation.en: Pretty average. How about you?
translation.zh: 很普通 那你呢？

translation.en: [Spieth] It was pretty average, and then I won.
translation.zh: 之前很普通 然后我赢了

translation.en: [Fowler] They're the first to either help each other
translation.zh: 他们是最先帮助彼此的人

translation.en: or give each other shit or whatever it may be.
translation.zh: 或吐槽彼此或其他什么的

translation.en: Being able to use it to your advantage, that's a lot of, like,
translation.zh: 能好好利用这个优势

translation.en: just solid, like, personal satisfaction.
translation.zh: 会让自己满意度大增

translation.en: Squeeze.
translation.zh: 用力

translation.en: All right, on your side.
translation.zh: 好了 侧躺

translation.en: Oh man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [trainer] We're trying to get the most out of him.
translation.zh: 我们想让他训练到状态最佳

translation.en: [trainer] So even if it's, like, 1%,
translation.zh: 哪怕只是提升1%

translation.en: that's a game changer in what he's accomplishing week after week.
translation.zh: 在他每周的训练中都非常关键

translation.en: [Tullier] Good. From that socket.
translation.zh: 很好 从那个关节发力

translation.en: Let's get it.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Ten and ten. Good.
translation.zh: 继续 很好

translation.en: That's perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: [Renner] You cannot emulate the pressure of a major championship week.
translation.zh: 大赛周的压力无可比拟

translation.en: [Tullier] Here we go. Load, load, load. Yep.
translation.zh: 来吧 用力 对

translation.en: Players learn the most about themselves.
translation.zh: 球手最了解自己

translation.en: [Tullier] Good. Just like that. Two.
translation.zh: 很好 就这样 二

translation.en: -[Renner] How they react under pressure. -[Tullier] Awesome.
translation.zh: 他们在压力下会如何反应 -太棒了 -他们需要如何在压力下控制自己

translation.en: [Renner] What they need to control under pressure.
translation.zh: -太棒了 -他们需要如何在压力下控制自己

translation.en: [Tullier] Good. One. Yes, sir. Two.
translation.zh: 很好 一 二

translation.en: -[Thomas] Majors are definitely different. -[Tullier] Good job.
translation.zh: -大赛完全不同 -做得好

translation.en: [Thomas] You'd think the preparation and the mindset
translation.zh: 按说会以为大赛前的

translation.en: and everything toward them is the same, but it's not.
translation.zh: 准备工作和心态都一样 但其实不然

translation.en: It's really screwed up to say, but it's almost like you try harder.
translation.zh: 说起来有点丢人 但其实会更努力

translation.en: [Dethier] Jordan Spieth is always gonna have the PGA Championship
translation.zh: 乔丹斯皮斯每年都会在日历上

translation.en: circled on his calendar because he needs it
translation.zh: 圈出美巡冠军赛的日子 因为他需要

translation.en: to complete the Career Grand Slam.
translation.zh: 完成职业大满贯

translation.en: That means winning all four major championships,
translation.zh: 这意味着赢得所有四大赛事冠军

translation.en: which is a feat that only five players in the game's history have ever been able to accomplish.
translation.zh: 这项伟业历史上只有五名球手完成过

translation.en: If he could win and finish off the Career Grand Slam,
translation.zh: 如果他能赢下职业大满贯

translation.en: that would cement Spieth's status as an all-time legend of the game.
translation.zh: 那将让斯皮斯成为高尔夫的传奇

translation.en: [Dethier] But if JT were to win,
translation.zh: 但如果JT赢了

translation.en: now that major championship gap is three to two.
translation.zh: 他们之间的大赛冠军差 就从三个缩短成两个

translation.en: So the difference between the careers of Jordan Spieth and Justin Thomas
translation.zh: 所以乔丹斯皮斯 和贾斯汀托马斯在职业上的差距

translation.en: would start to look a lot smaller.
translation.zh: 也变小了

translation.en: 2020, Kolby made me finish my abs right here
translation.zh: 2020年 科尔比让我在这边练腹肌

translation.en: to just stare at that DJ Player of the Year banner.
translation.zh: 边看着DJ球手的年度海报

translation.en: [Tullier] You see those up there, you either wanna get another one
translation.zh: 你看到海报上的人 要不就是你想换一张

translation.en: or you're tired of one guy getting them all.
translation.zh: 或是厌倦让一个人得到全部

translation.en: [Thomas] I hadn't put anything up there in a while, so it's pretty motivating.
translation.zh: 我已经好久没有换海报了 所以还挺鼓舞人心的

translation.en: Should have to take 'em down after a couple years.
translation.zh: 应该几年就换一波的

translation.en: [man] Do you think you can win the PGA this year?
translation.zh: 你觉得今年的美巡赛你能赢吗？

translation.en: I know I can win the PGA Championship this year. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我知道我今年可以赢得美巡冠军赛

translation.en: I mean, I know for a fact, 1,000%, that I can. It's just a matter of if I will or not.
translation.zh: 我知道有百分之一千我能赢 问题是我是否会赢

translation.en: [announcer] Good morning from Tulsa, Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 早上好 来自俄克拉何马州图尔萨的问候

translation.en: We are here at Southern Hills for the PGA Championship.
translation.zh: 我们在南山 参加美巡冠军赛

translation.en: And we know that you out there are anxious to see who we've got this morning.
translation.zh: 我们知道大家都想知道 今早会有哪些选手参赛

translation.en: [boy] Jordan! Jordan!
translation.zh: 乔丹！

translation.en: [announcer] Well, it's loaded everywhere you look.
translation.zh: 到处都是人

translation.en: There's so many talented guys on tour. It's so hard to win out here.
translation.zh: 今年锦标赛有很多有才华的人 想在这里取胜很难

translation.en: Any week someone can get hot,
translation.zh: 任何一周都会有人手感好

translation.en: and they'll be tough to catch unless you have your A game.
translation.zh: 如果不拿出看家本领 就难以追赶

translation.en: -[man] Rory! -[man 2] Rory! [fans] Rory!
translation.zh: -罗里！ -罗里！

translation.en: [golfer] This is my sixteenth year on tour.
translation.zh: 这是我参加锦标赛的第16年

translation.en: The pinnacle of golf is always gonna be the four major championships.
translation.zh: 高尔夫的顶峰永远是四大赛事

translation.en: But the four that I've won were so long ago
translation.zh: 但我取胜的那四大赛已经是很久前了

translation.en: that I feel like I'm trying to win my first one again.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己像是努力第一次赢一样

translation.en: [reporter] One of the biggest stories is who is not playing.
translation.zh: 今天最大的新闻是谁不参赛

translation.en: Defending champ, Phil Mickelson.
translation.zh: 卫冕冠军菲尔米克尔森

translation.en: [reporter 2] With Phil, is it strange not having the defending champ here this week?
translation.zh: 卫冕冠军菲尔这周不在 感觉奇怪吗？

translation.en: And just the whole Saudi golf story. What's your take?
translation.zh: 还有沙特资助的高尔夫球赛 你有什么看法？

translation.en: It's unfortunate Phil's not here. I mean, his accomplishment last year
translation.zh: 很遗憾菲尔没来 他去年的成就

translation.en: was one of the greatest accomplishments in the history of the game.
translation.zh: 是比赛历史上最伟大的成就之一

translation.en: [announcer] Phil defeats Father Time.
translation.zh: 菲尔打败了年龄

translation.en: He's taken major championship golf to a place it's never been.
translation.zh: 他把高尔夫锦标赛带上了 前所未有的新高度

translation.en: The current champion hasn't played since making comments
translation.zh: 自从对沙特赞助的 高尔夫球赛发表评论后 冠军还未参加过比赛

translation.en: about the new Saudi-backed golf series.
translation.zh: 高尔夫球赛发表评论后 冠军还未参加过比赛

translation.en: [Dethier] The idea of LIV has been around for years,

translation.zh: 高尔夫因为每个人在不同的时间打球

translation.en: it's just not over till it's over.
translation.zh: 在所有人完赛前 都没有真正结束

translation.en: [announcer] Mito Pereira, to take a two shot lead.
translation.zh: 米托佩雷拉 领先两杆

translation.en: [Foley] Anything can happen.
translation.zh: 什么都可能发生

translation.en: [announcer] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Renner] At the end of Sunday, if two or more players
translation.zh: 周日结束时 如果两个或以上的球手

translation.en: are tied at the top with the same score,
translation.zh: 以相同成绩位列第一

translation.en: they're going to play three-set holes during a playoff.
translation.zh: 他们就要进行三洞加赛

translation.en: [announcer 2] Will Zalatoris join Justin Thomas at five under?
translation.zh: 扎拉托利斯会和贾斯汀托马斯 一样以少5杆成绩完赛吗？

translation.en: [Foley] The fact that Justin Thomas is done for the day
translation.zh: 贾斯汀托马斯已经完赛

translation.en: and now he's gotta wait to find out if he's gonna be in a playoff or not,
translation.zh: 所以他要等待看是否需要加赛

translation.en: that really leads to the drama of the sport.
translation.zh: 这是比赛的重头戏

translation.en: [announcer 3] It's all up to Mito now.
translation.zh: 一切都取决于米托了

translation.en: A par on the 18th hole and the championship is his.
translation.zh: 第18洞以标准杆完赛 那冠军就是他的

translation.en: Bogey, we're headed towards a three-way playoff.
translation.zh: 打出柏忌球 就要进行三人加赛

translation.en: [man] Baba Booey!
translation.zh: 巴巴布伊！

translation.en: [announcer] Oh dear. That is frightening follow-through.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是吓人

translation.en: Where is it?
translation.zh: 球去哪里了？

translation.en: [announcer] Oh my goodness. It could make a follow-through.
translation.zh: 天呐 可能会对后面造成影响

translation.en: Oh my goodness, it's in the water. Oh my goodness.
translation.zh: 天呐 球掉水里了

translation.en: [announcer 2] No.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: Sunk at the seventy-second and now faces a one-shot penalty.
translation.zh: 球进了水里 要罚一杆

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: I fucked it up. On the last hole, man…
translation.zh: 我搞砸了 在最后一个洞…

translation.en: [announcer] All action stations.
translation.zh: 所有人员注意

translation.en: [Thomas] Plenty of room here guys. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这里空间很大 谢谢

translation.en: [announcer] That all happened so quick.
translation.zh: 事情发生得太快了

translation.en: [announcer 2] It really did.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: [Mike] We saw that tee shot.
translation.zh: 我们看到了开球

translation.en: Colt! Colt! Colt, do you have a monitor or anything?
translation.zh: 科尔 你有监视器吗？

translation.en: -[Mike] We're like, oh boy. -Still got plenty of time, guys.
translation.zh: -突然变成这样了 -还有很多时间 伙计们

translation.en: -We still got a chance. Yeah. -Mito's dropping right now.
translation.zh: -我们还有机会 对 -米托现在要抛球了

translation.en: Drop into the edge here, right?
translation.zh: 往这个方向抛球 对吧？

translation.en: -[inaudible] -Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [announcer] After the penalty drop, Mito preparing for his third shot.
translation.zh: 罚一杆之后抛球 米托在准备第三杆

translation.en: [announcer 2] Pereira's gotta do something miraculous.
translation.zh: 佩雷拉一定要打出奇迹之球

translation.en: [announcer 3] It's left and not cutting.
translation.zh: 往左 有些偏右

translation.en: [announcer 2] Oh dear.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [announcer] It's all down to this.
translation.zh: 一切都取决于这个球

translation.en: He has to get down in two to make it a three-man playoff.
translation.zh: 他必须在两杆内进洞 才能进行三人加赛

translation.en: [man] Missed the green left. Gotta get up and down to get in the playoff.
translation.zh: 错过了左边的果岭 得在两杆内完赛才能进加赛

translation.en: [Thomas] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [announcer 2] Might not even stay on.
translation.zh: 也许不用继续打

translation.en: Oh, there it goes.
translation.zh: 来了

translation.en: [man] He didn't hold the chip shot. Think he chipped it over the green.
translation.zh: 他没把握住这一记切杆 应该是打到果岭上去了

translation.en: [announcer 3] Mito's last throw of the dice.
translation.zh: 米托最后一次尝试

translation.en: [announcer 3] Golf can be such a cruel game.
translation.zh: 高尔夫有时候真是个残酷的比赛

translation.en: [announcer 2] And a tied third finish.
translation.zh: 以并列第三名完赛

translation.en: So we know now we have a playoff.
translation.zh: 所以现在要进行加赛

translation.en: Hasn't been a playoff in this championship since 2011.
translation.zh: 自2011年以来 这个锦标赛还没进行过加赛

translation.en: [Renner] They're going to play against one another in the same group
translation.zh: 他们要在同一组里对战

translation.en: until one person comes out with the lowest score.
translation.zh: 直到有人的比分更低胜出

translation.en: [man 2] Here we go, JT!
translation.zh: 加油 JT

translation.en: [announcer] Will Zalatoris. [announcer 2] Former number-one amateur in the world.
translation.zh: -威尔扎拉托利斯 -前世界第一业余选手

translation.en: [announcer 2] Found the fairway.
translation.zh: 球落到了球道上

translation.en: [announcer] Advantage, Zalatoris.
translation.zh: 有优势 扎拉托利斯

translation.en: [Mike] You gotta be patient and be smart to stay in the playoffs.
translation.zh: 加赛中必须要有耐心 用脑子

translation.en: [announcer] Spectacular shot for Thomas.
translation.zh: 托马斯的这一杆很精彩

translation.en: [announcer 3] Zalatoris for birdie.
translation.zh: 扎拉托利斯打小鸟球

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, baby! -[man 2] Let's go, Will!
translation.zh: -好样的！ -加油 威尔！

translation.en: [Mike] Come on, J.
translation.zh: 加油 J

translation.en: -[man] Go! -[man 2] Let's go!
translation.zh: -进洞！ -进洞！

translation.en: [announcer 3] Both players with birdies at the first of the three holes.
translation.zh: 两位选手在三洞的第一洞 都打出了小鸟球

translation.en: -[man 3] No! -[man 4] One time, JT!
translation.zh: -不！ -一杆进洞 JT！

translation.en: [announcer] A nice little twirl. He likes it.
translation.zh: 不错的旋转 他喜欢

translation.en: [announcer] He loves it now.
translation.zh: 现在他更喜欢了

translation.en: [announcer 2] What a golf shot.
translation.zh: 无与伦比的一杆

translation.en: [announcer] Zalatoris has a birdie putt coming up.
translation.zh: 扎拉托利斯准备推杆打小鸟球

translation.en: [announcer 3] About seven or eight feet here.
translation.zh: 大概2米到2米4的距离

translation.en: [announcer 4] Thomas knocks his in, it'll be the first time he actually
translation.zh: 如果这杆托马斯能打进洞 那就是自他周五下午以来

translation.en: has the lead since Friday afternoon.
translation.zh: 第一次真正领先

translation.en: [Thomas] When you have those big putts,
translation.zh: 当进行这么远的推杆时

translation.en: you can almost, like, hear and feel your heart beating.
translation.zh: 你几乎能听见自己的心脏跳动

translation.en: [Mike] Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 拜托 加油

translation.en: [announcer 5] Here's to take a one-shot lead to the 18th tee in this three-hole playoff.
translation.zh: 在打完18个洞后 三洞加赛中他暂时领先一杆

translation.en: [Thomas] Trying to calm yourself down,
translation.zh: 努力让自己冷静下来

translation.en: it's tough.
translation.zh: 很难

translation.en: [announcer 3] Birdie-birdie start for Justin Thomas.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀托马斯率先打出小鸟球

translation.en: [Thomas] But if you're not nervous, it doesn't mean anything to you.
translation.zh: 但如果你不紧张 那比赛就对你没有任何意义

translation.en: [announcer 6] Justin takes the lead over Will Zalatoris with one hole remaining in the playoff.
translation.zh: 加赛还剩一个洞 贾斯汀暂时领先威尔扎拉托利斯

translation.en: [announcer 7] He got a straight bounce. Perfect.
translation.zh: 很直线的一个球 完美

translation.en: [man 6] Baba Booey!
translation.zh: 巴巴布伊！

translation.en: [announcer 7] That one's on a line. Way to lock it.
translation.zh: 这个球在路线上 非常棒

translation.en: Come on, man.
translation.zh: 加油啊

translation.en: [man 7] Get in the hole!
translation.zh: 进洞！

translation.en: [announcer] Went dead straight, but got it all the way up there.
translation.zh: 路线非常直 但距离有些远

translation.en: [announcer 2] Zalatoris, one behind, has to make a birdie.
translation.zh: 扎拉托利斯 落后一杆 最后必须打出小鸟球

translation.en: [announcer] Get in there.
translation.zh: 进洞

translation.en: [man 8] Come on, get in there!
translation.zh: 加油 进洞！

translation.en: [announcer 2] And Justin, two putts for his second major.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀 再来两个推杆 就能获得第二个大赛冠军

translation.en: [Mike] Holy shit.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Come on, man. Two putts, let's play.
translation.zh: 加油 两个推杆 来吧

translation.en: Gotta do this. He needs to make his putt.
translation.zh: 他必须推杆进洞

translation.en: [announcer 2] From seven down at the start of the day.
translation.zh: 今天刚开始时他落后7杆

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Go in! Go in! Go in!
translation.zh: 进洞！

translation.en: [announcer 2] Five years later…
translation.zh: 五年后

translation.en: It's Justin Thomas, again, at the PGA Championship.
translation.zh: 贾斯汀托马斯又在美巡冠军赛上

translation.en: -[Mike] I'm so happy for you! -[Thomas] Thank you, Dad.
translation.zh: -我真为你高兴 -谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: Well, that's why you never give up, right?
translation.zh: 所以你永远不会放弃 对吧？

translation.en: [man] She's gonna ask Jim to present the trophy and help you lift it up.
translation.zh: 她会让吉姆来展示奖杯 帮你抬起来

translation.en: Celebrate with the trophy and-- PGA Champ, bud.
translation.zh: 庆祝获得奖杯和美巡赛冠军

translation.en: [announcer] Our 2022 PGA Champion, Justin Thomas.
translation.zh: 2022年美巡冠军赛冠军 贾斯汀托马斯

translation.en: -[cheering] -♪ …Of myth still stands… ♪
translation.zh: （冠军 美巡冠军赛）

translation.en: [Thomas] Winning my second major, that's something I've been trying to do for five years now.
translation.zh: 赢得我的第二个大赛冠军 是我五年来一直努力的目标

translation.en: I'm speechless. Like, this just happened. It's over. We just won,
translation.zh: 我无言以对 就这么发生了 结束了 我们赢了

translation.en: and there's no more shots to play.
translation.zh: 不用再打比赛了

translation.en: [man] Where did you watch JT's final round?
translation.zh: 你在哪里看了JT的最后一轮？

translation.en: So, most of the time-- We stayed together in a house together that week.
translation.zh: 那周大部分时间我们在一起

translation.en: Most of the time we stick around, but I wanted to get home.
translation.zh: 大部分时间都在一起 但后来我想回家

translation.en: As much as I want to beat him, when I'm already done and I can't,
translation.zh: 尽管我想打败他 但我已经完赛 也做不到了

translation.en: then, you know, he's the guy I'm rooting for.
translation.zh: 我还是会为他加油

translation.en: -Are we going down there now? -[man] Through the clubhouse.
translation.zh: -我们现在要下去吗？ -穿过俱乐部

translation.en: [Spieth] And if anything, all it does is it makes me want to move ahead even more.
translation.zh: 要说有什么 也是让我有前进的动力

translation.en: [Thomas] It just happened so fast, man. Like, it sucks.
translation.zh: 冠军来得太快了 真糟糕

translation.en: I wish it'd go slower so you could, like, enjoy it more. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 我希望获胜能慢一点 好好享受 你懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: [man 2] …completed the most historic comeback
translation.zh: 今天见证了

translation.en: in PGA Championship and major golf history today.
translation.zh: 美巡冠军赛和大赛史上 最具历史性的回归

translation.en: Toast our 2022 PGA Champion, Justin Thomas.
translation.zh: 敬我们的2022年美巡冠军赛冠军 贾斯汀托马斯

translation.en: [Thomas] That tasted really good. Um…
translation.zh: 很好喝

translation.en: Yeah, it just, uh… It feels nice to be here right now. So thank you all.
translation.zh: 现在站在这里感觉很好 所以谢谢大家

translation.en: [man] What would you say feels better, winning or beating your friends?
translation.zh: 你觉得冠军更好 还是打败你的朋友更好？

translation.en: Uh, winning, because if I win, then I also beat my friends. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 获胜 因为如果我赢了 我也会打败了我的朋友们

translation.en: You are super great. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你超级棒 谢谢

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Yeah, congratulations.
translation.zh: -恭喜 -恭喜你

translation.en: -JT, thank you, sir. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh: -JT 谢谢 先生 -非常感谢

translation.en: Thanks for waiting. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你等我 我很感激

translation.en: [announcer] The next PGA TOUR professional. Here he is, Brooks Koepka!
translation.zh: 下一个美巡赛职业球手 他来了 布鲁克斯科普卡！

translation.en: [Koepka] For three years, I was the best in the world.
translation.zh: 三年来我世界排名第一

translation.en: [announcer 2] Back-to-back bogeys.
translation.zh: 连续两个柏忌球

translation.en: I can't compete with them week in, week out.
translation.zh: 我不能每周都和他们打比赛

translation.en: [announcer 3] Scottie Scheffler with another quick win.
translation.zh: 斯科蒂舍夫勒又快速赢下一局

translation.en: [Renner] When Rory is playing at his best, I don't know who can beat him.
translation.zh: 罗里状态好的时候 我觉得无人能敌

translation.en: [reporter] Officials in Saudi Arabia are trying to create a new golf league
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯的官员们 正在努力打造一个新高尔夫联赛

translation.en: to rival the PGA TOUR.
translation.zh: 与美巡赛抗衡

translation.en: [reporter 2] Is there anywhere you wouldn't play on a moral basis?
translation.zh: 有没有什么比赛 你会因为道德原因而不参加？

translation.en: If the money was right, there anywhere you wouldn't play?
translation.zh: 如果奖金丰厚 你会有不参加的比赛吗？

translation.en: I don't know how to answer that question.
translation.zh: 我不需要回答这个问题

translation.en: [Johnson] I know I'm one of the best golfers in the world,
translation.zh: 我知道我是世界上 最好的高尔夫球手之一

translation.en: so I don't think there's anything to prove.
translation.zh: 所以我不用证明什么

translation.en: [Renner] He's so talented. It makes people wonder, "Why isn't he just winning every week?"
translation.zh: 他很有才华 会让人不禁好奇 他为什么没有每周都赢球？

translation.en: To be a great golfer and be a great father. Why can't I have both?
translation.zh: 成为伟大的高尔夫球手和伟大的父亲 为什么不能两者兼得呢？

translation.en: [Fitzpatrick] PGA TOUR win, a dream growing up.
translation.zh: 美巡赛获胜是我从小的梦想

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [Koepka] Winning is an addiction. It's win or go home.
translation.zh: 获胜会上瘾 如果不赢 就得回家

translation.en: -Are you miked up right now? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你现在拿着麦克风吗？ -对

translation.en: Netflix, get this.
translation.zh: Netflix 看招吧
